title: Sekaino Owariga Furu Yoruni
original_name: 世界の終わりが降る夜に…
sinopse:
To pay for his late father million yen debt, Takashina Yuri prostituted himself. Meanwhile his younger brother Nagi who supposedly in a coma after their parents death 7 years ago came back…. or is he? What if ‘Nagi’ has it own agenda towards Yuri. And is Nagi truly Yuris long lost brother or someone else?

(Source: Manga traders)
